description.narrative: Indo Trans Logistics (ITL), founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, is one of the leading logistics companies in Vietnam. Over the years, through organic growth, selective acquisitions, and strategic partnership with key logistic players, ITL has become the logistic solutions provider for integrated 3PL logistics, aviation services, freight forwarding, warehousing and contract logistic in Vietnam. ITL has 81 offices servicing more than 30 cities across Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar, Thailand, and Singapore. It has 17 subsidiaries and 7 associate companies. ITLs business is divided into the five main segments: - Aviation Service: ITL is acting as General Sales and Services Agent (GSSA) for air cargo handling around 200 flights per week in Vietnam and Indochina. In addition to cargo sales, ITL also provide value-added services to air cargo (space management, load distribution, cargo checking etc.) - Freight forwarding/ Transportation: ITL offers air and sea freight management, multi-modal transport, road haulage, railways, and customs brokerage. - Warehousing/ Contract Logistics: ITL provides logistics solutions to customers, including warehousing and inventory management, distribution and transportation. - Visa Application Center: ITL provides visa application services to consular sections as a sub-contractor for VFS Global a global company on visa application services). - Express delivery services: ITL provides express delivery services / cross-border delivery service for e-commerce markets.

The Project will support the transition of a domestic logistic player in Vietnam (via investment and acquisition) into an integrated service provider capable of delivering higher quality and efficient solutions to meet Vietnam's growing demand for logistics services. The main project-level effect is on stakeholders through improved access and quality of service for customers. Beyond the Project, the main source of expected market impact is contribution to market competitiveness via demonstration effects by supporting the development of a holistic logistics platform providing high-value-added services.
